title: Thorn Whip
content:
Thorn Whip Transmutation Cantrip Pulls the creature 3m closer to you. The target can't be pulled if it is Huge in size. 9m Action

Transmutation Cantrip

Pulls the creature 3m closer to you.

The target can't be pulled if it is Huge in size.

Thorn Whip is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Thorn Whip is a Cantrip from the Transmutation school. Spells are regulated forms of magic energy that can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Effects, buffing Characters, or interacting with th
